thread.title: 1 person dead after house fire in Napan, N.B.
thread.title_full: 1 person dead after house fire in Napan, N.B.

author: cbc
title: 1 person dead after house fire in Napan, N.B.
text:
Richibucto RCMP are investigating a house fire that left one person dead in Napan, N.B. (Sara Minogue/CBC)
Police say one person was found dead after a house fire in Napan, N.B., early Saturday morning.
The house was located on the Weldfield Road in Napan, approximately 10 kilometres outside Miramichi.
Police say they responded to the fire, along with firefighters at 5 a.m.
An unidentified body was located within the building.
Richibucto RCMP said an autopsy will be conducted and the investigation is ongoing.
